member.name: IMFClock.GetClockCharacteristics
member.summary: Retrieves the characteristics of the clock.
member.param: Receives a bitwise OR of values from the enumeration indicating the characteristics of the clock.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFClock.GetContinuityKey
member.summary: Retrieves the clock's continuity key. (Not supported.)

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFClock.GetCorrelatedTime
member.summary: Retrieves the last clock time that was correlated with system time.
member.param: Receives the last known clock time, in units of the clock's frequency.
Receives the system time that corresponds to the clock time returned in pllClockTime, in 100-nanosecond units.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The clock does not have a time source.

member.name: IMFClock.GetProperties
member.summary: Retrieves the properties of the clock.
member.param: Pointer to an structure that receives the properties.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFClock.GetState
member.summary: Retrieves the current state of the clock.
member.param: Receives the clock state, as a member of the enumeration.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Provides timing information from a clock in Microsoft Media Foundation.
Clocks and some media sinks expose this interface through QueryInterface.
